short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits displayed moves to next turn. When you want the eval + suggestions, but don't want the whole line spoiled. Lichess only.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Limits displayed chess moves to the next move for white and black. Useful for studies where you want to see the evaluation and suggested moves, but don't want the whole line spoiled. Screenshots show an actual position of a study that inspired this plugin where you want the engine to give you the next move quickly and work out the rest by yourself.

Developed by Kyle Boddy with inspiration from IM Marc Esserman.
